com.github.kennedyoliveira.pastebin4j.api

Interface PasteBinApi

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PasteBinApiImpl

    public interface PasteBinApi
    Represents the currently paste bin api exposed methods.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String createPaste(AccountCredentials accountCredentials, Paste paste)
      Creates a new paste and return the url for this created paste.
      boolean deletePaste(AccountCredentials accountCredentials, Paste paste)
      Deletes a paste from PasteBin
      boolean deletePaste(AccountCredentials accountCredentials, java.lang.String pasteKey)
      Deletes a paste from PasteBin, this method uses a unique key from a paste to delete it.
      UserInformation fetchUserInformation(AccountCredentials accountCredentials)
      Log into the api using the AccountCredentials.userName and AccountCredentials.password and fetch the user information, currently the support is only to fetch, you can't modify.
      java.lang.String fetchUserKey(AccountCredentials accountCredentials)
      Fetchs a new User Session Key, this key is used to identify a user when creating, deleting ou listing pastes.
      java.lang.String getPasteContent(Paste paste)
      Fetch the online contents of a paste.
      java.util.List<Paste> listTrends(AccountCredentials accountCredentials)
      List the currently trending pastes;
      java.util.List<Paste> listUserPastes(AccountCredentials accountCredentials)
      Lists up to 50 pastes created by the user.
      java.util.List<Paste> listUserPastes(AccountCredentials accountCredentials, int limit)
      Lists user pastes up to the amount especified in the limit parameter.

    • Method Detail

      • listTrends

        java.util.List<Paste> listTrends(@NotNull
                                 AccountCredentials accountCredentials)
        List the currently trending pastes;
        Parameters:
        accountCredentials - Account credentials to be used to log into the paste bin API.
        Returns:
        A list of pastes.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the accountCredentials is null

      • fetchUserKey

        java.lang.String fetchUserKey(@NotNull
                              AccountCredentials accountCredentials)
        Fetchs a new User Session Key, this key is used to identify a user when creating, deleting ou listing pastes.
        Parameters:
        accountCredentials - Account credentials to be used to log into the paste bin API.
        Returns:
        The new User Session Key created by the API.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the accountCredentials is null

      • fetchUserInformation

        UserInformation fetchUserInformation(@NotNull
                                     AccountCredentials accountCredentials)

        Log into the api using the AccountCredentials.userName and AccountCredentials.password and fetch the user information, currently the support is only to fetch, you can't modify.

        Parameters:
        accountCredentials - Account credentials to be used to log into the paste bin API.
        Returns:
        The user information.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the accountCredentials is null

      • createPaste

        java.lang.String createPaste(@NotNull
                             AccountCredentials accountCredentials,
                             @NotNull
                             Paste paste)
        Creates a new paste and return the url for this created paste.
        Parameters:
        accountCredentials - Account credentials to be used to log into the paste bin API.
        paste - The paste holding the information to be used in creating process.
        Returns:
        A url for the created paste.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the accountCredentials is null

      • listUserPastes

        java.util.List<Paste> listUserPastes(@NotNull
                                     AccountCredentials accountCredentials)

        Lists up to 50 pastes created by the user.

        The user is the one represented by the AccountCredentials.userKey that is fetched using a username and password

        Parameters:
        accountCredentials - Account credentials to be used to log into the paste bin API.
        Returns:
        A list of pastes created by the user.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the accountCredentials is null

      • listUserPastes

        java.util.List<Paste> listUserPastes(@NotNull
                                     AccountCredentials accountCredentials,
                                     int limit)

        Lists user pastes up to the amount especified in the limit parameter.

        The user is the one represented by the AccountCredentials.userKey that is fetched using a username and password

        Parameters:
        accountCredentials - Account credentials to be used to log into the paste bin API.
        limit - Limit up to 1000 pastes to fetch.
        Returns:
        A list of pastes fetched.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the accountCredentials is null

      • deletePaste

        boolean deletePaste(@NotNull
                    AccountCredentials accountCredentials,
                    @NotNull
                    Paste paste)

        Deletes a paste from PasteBin

        Parameters:
        accountCredentials - Account credentials to be used to log into the paste bin API.
        paste - The paste to be deleted.
        Returns:
        true if delete is succefully complete, false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the accountCredentials is null

      • deletePaste

        boolean deletePaste(@NotNull
                    AccountCredentials accountCredentials,
                    @NotNull
                    java.lang.String pasteKey)

        Deletes a paste from PasteBin, this method uses a unique key from a paste to delete it.

        This key is the Paste.key that is fetched from the site.

        Parameters:
        accountCredentials - Account credentials to be used to log into the paste bin API.
        pasteKey - The unique key of a paste.
        Returns:
        true if delete is succefully complete, false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the accountCredentials is null

      • getPasteContent

        java.lang.String getPasteContent(@NotNull
                                 Paste paste)

        Fetch the online contents of a paste.

        Parameters:
        paste - The paste to fetch contents.
        Returns:
        The content of the paste.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the paste is null or Paste.key
